properties.name: actuator.user
properties.description: Username required to access protected Spring Boot actuator endpoints.

properties.name: actuator.password
properties.description: Password required to access protected Spring Boot actuator endpoints.

properties.description: JWT access token duration, in seconds.

properties.name: jwt.refresh-token.duration
properties.description: JWT refresh token duration, in seconds.
